title: Sometimes app crashes on logout events  with "discovery.stopped"
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem
2-3 cases from 180 are crashed on logout. Sometimes app is crashed on logout on real devices as well - regardless of place (Profile > logout, switching networks, changing fleet etc)

#### Expected behavior
no crash

#### Actual behavior
app is crashed after logout confirmation


### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Create multiaccount
- Log out

### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 02/11/20
- Operating System: Android, iOS

#### Logs


```
11-02 03:42:11.870  6816  6909 D StatusModule: Signal event: {"type":"discovery.stopped","event":null}
11-02 03:42:11.877  6816     0 E Go      : panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
11-02 03:42:11.877  6816     0 E Go      : [signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x128 pc=0xb49a6359]
11-02 03:42:11.877  6816     0 E Go      : 
11-02 03:42:11.877  6816     0 E Go      : goroutine 342 [running]:
11-02 03:42:11.877  6816     0 E Go      : github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p.(*Server).Peers(0x0, 0x0, 0x85591c00, 0xb4c145a5)

11-02 03:42:11.878  6816     0 E Go      : github.com/status-im/status-go/protocol.(*Messenger).online(...)
```
